verses.verse: All the congregation <S%H5712><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their voice, <S%H6963><s%> and cried; <S%H5414><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> that night. <S%H3915><s%>

All the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron: <S%H175><s%> and the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H3863><s%> "Would that we had died <S%H4191><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt! <S%H4714><s%> or would <S%H3863><s%> that we had died <S%H4191><s%> in this wilderness! <S%H4057><s%>

Why does Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> us to this land, <S%H776><s%> to fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword? <S%H2719><s%> Our wives <S%H802><s%> and our little ones <S%H2945><s%> will be a prey: <S%H957><s%> wouldn't <S%H2896><s%> it be better for us to return <S%H7725><s%> into Egypt? <S%H4714><s%>"
They said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another, <S%H251><s%> "Let us make <S%H5414><s%> a captain, <S%H7218><s%> and let us return <S%H7725><s%> into Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces <S%H6440><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> all the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh, <S%H3312><s%> who were of those who spied <S%H8446><s%> out the land, <S%H776><s%> tore <S%H7167><s%> their clothes: <S%H899><s%>

and they spoke <S%H559><s%> to all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "The land, <S%H776><s%> which we passed <S%H5674><s%> through to spy <S%H8446><s%> it out, <S%H3966><s%> is an exceeding good <S%H2896><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>

If Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> delights <S%H2654><s%> in us, <S%H935><s%> then he will bring us into this land, <S%H776><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> it to us; <S%H776><s%> a land which flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>

Only don't <S%H4775><s%> rebel against Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> neither fear <S%H3372><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land; <S%H776><s%> for they are bread <S%H3899><s%> for us: <S%H6738><s%> their defense is removed <S%H5493><s%> from over them, <S%H3068><s%> and Yahweh is with us. <S%H3372><s%> Don't fear them."

But all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> threatened <S%H559><s%> to stone <S%H7275><s%> them with stones. <S%H7275><s%> The glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> to all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "How long will this people <S%H5971><s%> despise <S%H5006><s%> me? <S%H3808><s%> and how long will they not believe <S%H539><s%> in me, <S%H226><s%> for all the signs which I have worked <S%H6213><s%> among them? <S%H7130><s%>

I will strike <S%H5221><s%> them with the pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> and disinherit <S%H3423><s%> them, <S%H6213><s%> and will make of you a nation <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> and mightier than they. <S%H6099><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Then the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will hear <S%H8085><s%> it; <S%H5927><s%> for you brought up this people <S%H5971><s%> in your might <S%H3581><s%> from among them; <S%H7130><s%>

and they will tell <S%H559><s%> it to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of this land. <S%H776><s%> They have heard <S%H8085><s%> that you Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> are in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of this people; <S%H5971><s%> for you Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> are seen <S%H7200><s%> face <S%H5869><s%> to face, <S%H5869><s%> and your cloud <S%H6051><s%> stands <S%H5975><s%> over them, <S%H1980><s%> and you go before <S%H6440><s%> them, <S%H5982><s%> in a pillar of cloud <S%H6051><s%> by day, <S%H3119><s%> and in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night. <S%H3915><s%>

Now if you killed <S%H4191><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> then the nations <S%H1471><s%> which have heard <S%H8085><s%> the fame <S%H8088><s%> of you will speak, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

<S%H3068><s%> 'Because Yahweh was not <S%H1115><s%> able <S%H3201><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which he swore <S%H7650><s%> to them, <S%H7819><s%> therefore he has slain them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>'
Now please let the power <S%H3581><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> be great, <S%H1431><s%> according <S%H834><s%> as you have spoken, <S%H1696><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

<S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh is slow to anger, <S%H750><s%> and abundant <S%H7227><s%> in loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> forgiving <S%H5375><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and disobedience; <S%H6588><s%> and that will by no means <S%H5352><s%> clear <S%H5352><s%> the guilty, <S%H6485><s%> visiting the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> on the children, <S%H1121><s%> on the third <S%H8029><s%> and on the fourth generation. <S%H7256><s%>'

Please pardon <S%H5545><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%> according to the greatness <S%H1433><s%> of your loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> and according as you have forgiven <S%H5375><s%> this people, <S%H5971><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%> even until now. <S%H2008><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I have pardoned <S%H5545><s%> according to your word: <S%H1697><s%>
but in very deed, <S%H199><s%> as I live, <S%H2416><s%> and as all the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> with the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%>

because all those men <S%H582><s%> who have seen <S%H7200><s%> my glory, <S%H3519><s%> and my signs, <S%H226><s%> which I worked <S%H6213><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> yet have tempted <S%H5254><s%> me these ten <S%H6235><s%> times, <S%H6471><s%> and have not listened <S%H8085><s%> to my voice; <S%H6963><s%>

surely they shall not <S%H518><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which I swore <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers, <S%H1><s%> neither shall any of those who despised <S%H5006><s%> me see it: <S%H7200><s%>

but my servant <S%H5650><s%> Caleb, <S%H3612><s%> because <S%H6118><s%> he had another <S%H312><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> with him, <S%H310><s%> and has followed me fully, <S%H4390><s%> him will I bring <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> into which he went; <S%H935><s%> and his seed <S%H2233><s%> shall possess it. <S%H3423><s%>

Now the Amalekite <S%H6003><s%> and the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the valley: <S%H6010><s%> tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> turn, <S%H6437><s%> and go <S%H5265><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"How long shall I bear with this evil <S%H7451><s%> congregation, <S%H5712><s%> that murmur <S%H3885><s%> against me? <S%H8085><s%> I have heard the murmurings <S%H8519><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which they murmur against me. <S%H3885><s%>

Tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H2416><s%> 'As I live, says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> surely as <S%H3808><s%> you have spoken <S%H1696><s%> in my ears, <S%H241><s%> so will I do to you: <S%H6213><s%>

your dead bodies <S%H6297><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in this wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> and all who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of you, <S%H4557><s%> according to your whole number, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> who have murmured against me, <S%H3885><s%>

surely you shall not <S%H518><s%> come <S%H935><s%> into the land, <S%H776><s%> concerning which I swore <S%H3027><s%> that I would make you dwell <S%H7931><s%> therein, <S%H3612><s%> except Caleb the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh, <S%H3312><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun. <S%H5126><s%>

But your little ones, <S%H2945><s%> that you said <S%H559><s%> should be a prey, <S%H957><s%> them will I bring in, <S%H935><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which you have rejected. <S%H3988><s%>
But as for you, <S%H6297><s%> your dead bodies shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in this wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

Your children <S%H1121><s%> shall be wanderers <S%H7462><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and shall bear <S%H5375><s%> your prostitution, <S%H2184><s%> until your dead bodies <S%H6297><s%> be consumed <S%H8552><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

After the number <S%H4557><s%> of the days <S%H3117><s%> in which you spied <S%H8446><s%> out the land, <S%H776><s%> even forty <S%H705><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> for every day <S%H3117><s%> a year, <S%H3117><s%> you will bear <S%H5375><s%> your iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> even forty <S%H705><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and you will know <S%H3045><s%> my alienation. <S%H8569><s%>'

I, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, have spoken, <S%H1696><s%> surely <S%H518><s%> this will I do <S%H6213><s%> to <S%H2063><s%> all this evil <S%H7451><s%> congregation, <S%H5712><s%> who are gathered together <S%H3259><s%> against me: <S%H4057><s%> in this wilderness they shall be consumed, <S%H8552><s%> and there they shall die. <S%H4191><s%>"

The men, <S%H582><s%> whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to spy <S%H8446><s%> out the land, <S%H776><s%> who returned, <S%H7725><s%> and made all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> to murmur <S%H3885><s%> against him, <S%H3318><s%> by bringing up an evil report <S%H1681><s%> against the land, <S%H776><s%>

even those <S%H582><s%> men <S%H582><s%> who brought up <S%H3318><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> report <S%H1681><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> by the plague <S%H4046><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

But Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh, <S%H3312><s%> remained alive <S%H2421><s%> of those men <S%H1992><s%> who went <S%H1980><s%> to spy <S%H8446><s%> out the land. <S%H776><s%>
Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H1696><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> to all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> mourned <S%H56><s%> greatly. <S%H3966><s%>

They rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> we are here, <S%H5927><s%> and will go up to the place <S%H4725><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has promised: <S%H559><s%> for we have sinned. <S%H2398><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Why now do you disobey <S%H5674><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> since it shall not prosper? <S%H6743><s%>
Don't <S%H5927><s%> go up, for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> isn't <S%H7130><s%> among you; <S%H5062><s%> that you not be struck down before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies. <S%H341><s%>

For there the Amalekite <S%H6003><s%> and the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> are before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H5307><s%> and you shall fall by the sword: <S%H2719><s%> because you are turned <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H310><s%> from following Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> therefore Yahweh will not be with you. <S%H3068><s%>"

But they presumed <S%H6075><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain: <S%H2022><s%> nevertheless the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and Moses, <S%H4872><s%> didn't <S%H4185><s%> depart out <S%H4185><s%> of the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

Then the Amalekite <S%H6003><s%> came down, <S%H3381><s%> and the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in that mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> them and beat <S%H3807><s%> them down, <S%H2767><s%> even to Hormah.
